Anselm Kiefer: Walhalla

Until 12 February 2017, Bermondsey

News & Events

View all

Exhibition: He Ziangyu monograph released by Distanz

From March 2016

He Ziangyu and Liu Wei are among 74 international artists from 33 countries chosen to feature in the Yinchuan Biennale 2016

Exhibition: Runa Islam at SFMOMA, San Francisco

From March 2016

'Verso', SFMOMA's solo presentation of Bangladeshi-born British artist Runa Islam, features the US premiere of Cabinet of Prototypes (2009-10)

Preview: White Cube Mason's Yard

19 January, 6 to 8pm

Join us at Mason's Yard, London for hte preview of the new Park Seo-Bo exhibition curated by Katharine Kostyál. Curated by Katharine Kostyál

Anselm Kiefer

In conversation with Tim Marlow

In the Auditorium

In this film Anselm Kiefer discusses his work and his exhibition 'Walhalla' at White Cube Bermondsey with Tim Marlow.
